p: Vegetal material collection and extraction of the EO were carried out in the month of July during the morning. The extraction of EO was done by steam distillation with a distillation equipment of 385 liters of capacity. We used 38.5 liters of water for steam distillation and the amount of leaves and herbaceous branches was 44.750 kg. The EO obtain was dried with anhydrous Sodium Chloride, filtered and stored in amber glass bottle in a refrigerator at 4Â°C until use.
